How a 4 Year Cycle works.  Cycles are measured from low to low. The distance between the lows comes out to 4 years. Give or take a week or two.  You can see that from the bottom of Bitcoin's correction in 2015 it was exactly 4 years to the bottom of the bear cycle in 2019.  https://t.co/XUqkyKl4Vd
